name: Super Island Story - Running Hero
description:
Not the same as Parkour game -- Super Island Adventure
Twenty-first Century is the lack of talent and creativity -- what. You Is it right? WanNI follow the same pattern of XX parkour, XX escape it, 2013 is coming to an end, in the advent of a new year days, to introduce a out of the ordinary, very creative Parkour game -- Hello Island Adventure
But follow the same pattern of single character game mode, Hello Adventure Island break the normal procedure, create multi role model, let the game player feel novel and unique Parkour game.
Characteristics of 1: Explorer: good at jumping and glide to avoid obstacles
Features: good at climbing and direct 2: gorilla crash barrier
Followed the traditional game, the game will Parkour game sublimation "tide Mobile Games", game design is exquisite, very challenging, very suitable for Parkour high to play to challenge.
People familiar with the cartoon characters, background music, filled with a deep sense of nostalgia, but without losing the small fresh and cute, plus show ingenuity game modes, smooth dripping operation experience, also have the skills and ornamental, bring the cool for the game player, the most unique Beckoning experience.
Coming new year, Hello island adventure will launch in the platform, also don't hurry with your friends to adventure!
